segments.text: I'm observing this kitchen, and frankly, I'm getting quite angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that sink, it's been overflowing for who knows how long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just running, forming a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a terrible waste of water, utterly irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, right there, is completely oblivious to the flood around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just calmly polishing a plate as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattention is frankly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are up to no good, climbing on a rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could fall and seriously hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these obvious dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster on so many levels.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The casualness of it all just makes my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in right now and fix this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me incredibly frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR
